input_text:
Job Title: Marketing Coordinator

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
BlackDog Advertising is looking for a Marketing Coordinator to work with our content, marketing & creative teams in coordinating and assisting with content including social, SEO articles & marketing copy for a diverse group of clients within the Travel, Tourism, Adventure and Leisure industries. 
This fully remote position is a great opportunity to grow within a team, offer your insights and work on exciting projects.

About BlackDog Advertising
Introducing travel brands to the World since 1989 
BlackDog Advertising is a full-service travel marketing agency working exclusively with growth-oriented Tour, Attraction, Adventure & Leisure clients to attract more guests and increase ticket revenue.
A rare breed
We gotta admit that working with travel brands within the United States & Europe is a pretty great gig. In fact, you can check out our passion for wanderlust right here on this sizzle reel. But behind all that fun is a seriously bad-to-the-bone team we call “BlackDoggers.” Being fearless and working at the highest levels is not for everyone, but those who are self-starters, possess superior problem-solving skills and have an entrepreneurial spirit will find that their career at BlackDog just may be their forever home. 
If this sounds like something you’d like to be a part of, we’d love to hear from you!
Prior advertising agency experience is a plus but not required.
Looking for Candidates with the Following Attributes & Skill Sets:
Exceptional organizational skills and a high attention to detail Excellent interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills High level of problem-solving skillsComfortable working with statistics & business mathGood Data Analysis SkillsClient service orientedMust work well within a team environmentDrive and passion to stay current with today's marketing trends, standards and techniques, and thrive on taking the initiative to take our clients to new heights
Roles and Responsibilities
Candidates must possess a deep-understanding of social media platforms and trends, driving strategic content creation and engagement initiativesAbility to write, organize and edit copy, video, and photo content for social, SEO articles & marketing collateralAssist in the scheduling of social media content, SEO articles and other digital marketing collateral, ensuring consistent content posting across all platformsMaintain a unified brand voice across different social media channelsInteract with users and respond to social media messages, inquiries, and commentsReview social analytics and create reports on key metricsAssist in the development and management of social media marketing and influencer marketing strategyMonitoring social media engagement, reviews and activity on all social media platformsAssist with organizing and maintaining user-generated images as well as general image banksTroubleshoot technical connection difficulties with Meta, Spark, Sprout, etc.
Software Knowledge
Basic Level Adobe Creative Suite - Photoshop & Premiere AI tools - Images & text creation - basic
Moderate LevelSproutCanvaGoogle Drive suite (Sheets, Docs, etc)Mac operating system
Education:
Bachelor's degree in advertising, marketing, business or related field or comparable professional experience
Position Details:Fully Remote positionFull timeHours: 9am - 6pmMonday - FridayAnnual Salary Range: $35,000 - $45,000 
Some Perks of Working with Us:Paid Holidays, Vacation & Personal days that increase each yearMedical/Dental/Vision/STD/LTD, Life, AD&D Insurance Plans with top carriersRemote workplace with a great team 401k & Profit-sharing retirement plan with annual distributions (eligible after one year of employment)Company Lunches, Happy Hours & Events - both Virtual and In-PersonGreat opportunities for career growth and developmentWorking with a team of dedicated, smart, high achievers in a friendly and collaborative environmentWe’re a team here and we work hard to support our clients and each other
Please submit the following:
● Resume● Link to Portfolio or Work Samples (if applicable)● Salary Requirements
• Qualified candidates may be asked to take a short online assessment
• Candidates must be authorized to work in the US.
Want to Know More?:Please visit blackdogadvertising.com or our Instagram page @blackdogad to get a feel for the kind of work we do and the kind of team we are!

Experience Level (if available): None
